WorkItem.ClosedComment: We fixed this for the 0.8.3 release.
WorkItem.Description:
Visual studio started hanging up on me this morning after I edited a file. (attached)

I isolated the issue to one file and found I recieved an error when attempting to compile the declaration file.

I'm running 0.8.2 with the latest webessentials.

C:\test>tsc --declaration proj.ts
tsc.js(14321, 13) Microsoft JScript runtime error: Unable to get value of the property 'getScopedTypeNameEx': object is null or undefined

Thanks for your help!
WorkItem.Summary: Error: Unable to get value of the property 'getScopedTypeNameEx': object is null or undefined when compiling declaration

Comments.Message: I just removed the AdminViewModel class that extends the ViewModel and the declaration file compiles and visual studio is happy.
Thanks for reporting this, marked active. This means we're taking a look at fixing this.
